languages.text: {n}В вашей {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}прошлой жизни{/d} способность определять, надежный ли перед вами человек или крыса, зачастую прокладывала границу между жизнью и смертью. Под пристальным взглядом рядовой слишком спокоен — верный знак, что паршивец изо всех сил старается навешать вам лапши.{/n}

{n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}past life{/d}, the ability to tell whether someone was trustworthy or a rat often marked the line between life and death. Under your scrutiny, the trooper seems far too calm — a sure sign the wretch is labouring to mislead you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В вашей {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}прошлой жизни{/d} способность определять, надежный ли перед вами человек или крыса, зачастую прокладывала границу между жизнью и смертью. Под пристальным взглядом рядовой слишком спокоен — верный знак, что паршивец изо всех сил старается навешать вам лапши.{/n}

{n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}past life{/d}, the ability to tell whether someone was trustworthy or a rat often marked the line between life and death. Under your scrutiny, the trooper seems far too calm — a sure sign the wretch is labouring to mislead you.{/n}

{n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}past life{/d}, the ability to tell whether someone was trustworthy or a rat often marked the line between life and death. Under your scrutiny, the trooper seems far too calm — a sure sign the wretch is labouring to mislead you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}犯罪者としての過去{/d}では、信用できる相手か密告者かを見抜く力が生死を分けた。お前に睨まれてなお、あの兵隊風情は落ち着きすぎている――お前を欺こうと必死な証拠だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}past life{/d}, the ability to tell whether someone was trustworthy or a rat often marked the line between life and death. Under your scrutiny, the trooper seems far too calm — a sure sign the wretch is labouring to mislead you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}犯罪者としての過去{/d}では、信用できる相手か密告者かを見抜く力が生死を分けた。お前に睨まれてなお、あの兵隊風情は落ち着きすぎている――お前を欺こうと必死な証拠だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}vida pasada{/d}, la capacidad de discernir si alguien era digno de confianza o un soplón significaba a menudo la diferencia entre la vida y la muerte. Bajo tu escrutinio el soldado se te antoja demasiado tranquilo, una clara señal de que pretende engañarte de algún modo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}past life{/d}, the ability to tell whether someone was trustworthy or a rat often marked the line between life and death. Under your scrutiny, the trooper seems far too calm — a sure sign the wretch is labouring to mislead you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}vida pasada{/d}, la capacidad de discernir si alguien era digno de confianza o un soplón significaba a menudo la diferencia entre la vida y la muerte. Bajo tu escrutinio el soldado se te antoja demasiado tranquilo, una clara señal de que pretende engañarte de algún modo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}过去的人生{/d}中，能否准确判断出对方是否可信，往往关乎生死。你仔细观察着眼前的士兵，意识到他的举止实在是太冷静了。很显然，这个渣滓正在极力误导你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}past life{/d}, the ability to tell whether someone was trustworthy or a rat often marked the line between life and death. Under your scrutiny, the trooper seems far too calm — a sure sign the wretch is labouring to mislead you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}过去的人生{/d}中，能否准确判断出对方是否可信，往往关乎生死。你仔细观察着眼前的士兵，意识到他的举止实在是太冷静了。很显然，这个渣滓正在极力误导你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}In deinem {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}früheren Leben{/d} machte die Fähigkeit, vertrauenswürdige Personen von Ratten zu unterscheiden oft den Unterschied zwischen Leben und Tod aus. Der Truppler wirkt angesichts deiner Untersuchung viel zu ruhig ... ein sicheres Zeichen, dass er dich in die Irre führen will.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}past life{/d}, the ability to tell whether someone was trustworthy or a rat often marked the line between life and death. Under your scrutiny, the trooper seems far too calm — a sure sign the wretch is labouring to mislead you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In deinem {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}früheren Leben{/d} machte die Fähigkeit, vertrauenswürdige Personen von Ratten zu unterscheiden oft den Unterschied zwischen Leben und Tod aus. Der Truppler wirkt angesichts deiner Untersuchung viel zu ruhig ... ein sicheres Zeichen, dass er dich in die Irre führen will.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dans votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}vie passée{/d}, savoir faire la différence entre une personne digne de confiance et un traître pouvait bien souvent vous sauver la vie. Sous votre regard inquisiteur, le soldat semble bien trop calme, preuve indéniable que ce misérable cherche à vous tromper.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}past life{/d}, the ability to tell whether someone was trustworthy or a rat often marked the line between life and death. Under your scrutiny, the trooper seems far too calm — a sure sign the wretch is labouring to mislead you.{/n}

Sous votre regard inquisiteur, le soldat semble bien trop calme, preuve indéniable que ce misérable cherche à vous tromper.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Geçmiş yaşantında{/d} birinin güvenilir biri mi yoksa bir lağım faresi mi olduğunu anlama yeteneği, genellikle yaşamla ölüm arasındaki ince çizgiyi belirlerdi. İncelediğin asker fazlasıyla sakin görünüyor, bu da bu sefil varlığın seni yanıltmak için çaba gösterdiğini kesin olarak kanıtlıyor.{/n}

Under your scrutiny, the trooper seems far too calm — a sure sign the wretch is labouring to mislead you.{/n}
